content: st chain 2 1 puff st in chain 2 corner space corner 1 fpdc around puff st from previous round 1 fpdc in next 3 sts 1 double_crochet in next 4 sts 1 fpdc in next st 2 puff sts between the 2 puffs from previous round 1 fpdc in next st 1 double_crochet in next 4 sts* repeat *to* to end join with a slip_stitch to first fpdc not chain 2 fasten_off 8x 2 puff st 32 double_crochet 40 fpdc 4x double_crochet chain 2 2 double_crochet in same space corner 1 double_crochet in puff st 1 double_crochet in next 9 sts 1 double_crochet in puff st 1 double_crochet between puff sts 1 double_crochet in puff st 1 double_crochet in next 9 sts 1 double_crochet in puff st *2 double_crochet chain 2 2 double_crochet in chain 2 corner space corner 1 double_crochet in puff st 1 double_crochet in next 9 sts 1 double_crochet in puff st 1 double_crochet between puff sts 1 double_crochet in puff st 1 double_crochet in next 9 sts 1 double_crochet in puff st* repeat *to* to end join with a slip_stitch to top of chain 3 108 double_crochet 4x chain 2 space round 14 slip_stitch to next st slip_stitch to chain 2 corner space chain 3 counts as double_crochet 1 double_crochet chain 2 2 double_crochet in same space corner 1 double_crochet in each st to next corner *2 double_crochet chain 2 2 double_crochet in chain 2 corner space corner 1 double_crochet in each st to next corner* repeat *to* to end join with a slip_stitch to top of chain 3 124 double_crochet 4x chain 2 space round 14 slip_stitch to next st slip_stitch to chain 2 corner space chain 3 counts as double_crochet 1 double_crochet chain 2 2 double_crochet in same space corner 1 double_crochet in each st to next corner *2 double_crochet chain 2 2 double_crochet in chain 2 corner space corner 1 double_crochet in each st to next corner* repeat *to* to end join with a slip_stitch to top of chain 3 140 double_crochet 4x chain 2 space fasten_off weave in all ends block if desired thank you for choosing this pattern for your next project when you make it i d like to see it remember to tag me @k a m e_crochet or using hashtag #kamecrochet on instagram if you have any questions about the pattern please contact me at kamecrochet@gmail com or ravelry https //www ravelry com/people/mytia89 facebook https //www facebook com/kamecrochet instagram https //www instagram com/k a m e_crochet happy crocheting k a m e
